unittitle.title: An Episode In the Life of Ezekial Whitmore

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes two versions: Version 1 (p. 1-7, complete), early draft of Zekie the Country Mouse, credited to H. Simpson; Version 2 An Episode In the Life of Ezekial Whitmore--A Person of Small Learning but Great Wisdom (p. 1-7, complete), earliest draft of Zekie.
